org.apache.thrift.transport
类 TMemoryBuffer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport
      org.apache.thrift.transport.TMemoryBuffer

public class TMemoryBuffer
extends TTransport

Memory buffer-based implementation of the TTransport interface.

构造方法摘要
TMemoryBuffer(int size)
          Create a TMemoryBuffer with an initial buffer size of size.

          Closes the transport.

          Output the contents of the memory buffer as a String, using the supplied encoding

构造方法详细信息

TMemoryBuffer

public TMemoryBuffer(int size)
Create a TMemoryBuffer with an initial buffer size of size. The internal buffer will grow as necessary to accommodate the size of the data being written to it.

方法详细信息

isOpen

public boolean isOpen()
从类 TTransport 复制的描述
Queries whether the transport is open.

指定者：
类 TTransport 中的 isOpen
返回：

read

public int read(byte[] buf,
                int off,
                int len)
从类 TTransport 复制的描述
Reads up to len bytes into buffer buf, starting at offset off.

指定者：
类 TTransport 中的 read
参数：
buf - Array to read into
off - Index to start reading at
len - Maximum number of bytes to read
返回：
The number of bytes actually read

write

public void write(byte[] buf,
                  int off,
                  int len)
从类 TTransport 复制的描述
Writes up to len bytes from the buffer.

指定者：
类 TTransport 中的 write
参数：
buf - The output data buffer
off - The offset to start writing from
len - The number of bytes to write

toString

public java.lang.String toString(java.lang.String enc)
                          throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
Output the contents of the memory buffer as a String, using the supplied encoding

参数：
enc - the encoding to use
返回：
the contents of the memory buffer as a String
抛出：
